channel.title: Dashboard on JobRunr
channel.description: Recent content in Dashboard on JobRunr

item.title: Intro to JobRunr
item.description: Introduction to JobRunr Explore the basics of JobRunr and learn how to setup JobRunr in vanilla Java or your favorite web framework. Discover how to enqueue jobs and schedule jobs, find out how to create CRON jobs and how to use the dashboard.

item.title: Authentication and Authorization Guides
item.description: Authentication and Authorization Guides Explore JobRunr Pro's comprehensive collection of authentication and authorization guides to secure your dashboard effortlessly. Learn how to implement robust user authentication and fine-tuned authorization controls with our step-by-step tutorials.
